text:
I hurried. Before the night ends, I thought.
I ran. Before the morning comes, I thought.

But, always, I never knew what awaits
for me at the end of the road.

Even the well-known Cinderella from that fairy tale, that night,
when she started running, she couldn't have known what would lay ahead.

She just ran towards the hot, shining light.
Without knowing who was waiting inside the shining castle.

The only reason she went towards the dazzling
thing was longing— A feeling of yearning.

name: Shennong
text:
...*yawn*.
Zzz... hmm.

In the infirmary of Shinjuku Academy, Shennong has a dream.
A dream, from his childhood... or perhaps, from before he was born.

In his homeland of Penglai, there was a legend.
A legend of a dragon-serpent named Nüwa, and... her legend as a wicked woman.

Even though she was born as the sister of the 'World Representative' Fuxi,
there is a reason why that Nüwa was called things like 'problem child' and 'villainess'.

That is... because her behavior, her way of life,
was in direct opposition to the teachings of the otherworld Penglai.

According to some, Nüwa was always short-sighted,
never thinking about the future, and only looking at what caught her eye the most.

A woman who would reach out to something shining in front of her
without thinking about the consequences, and then run off right away.

In contrast, Penglai is a world of 'faith in the path'.
All things are on the path of a long journey.

People are born and die. New dynasties rise and fall.
The world, looping itself on few certain patterns.

And so, to see far into the future is the behavior of a wise man.
Growing old was the path to becoming a revered immortal.

However, Nüwa turned her back on all
the common sense of such a world, and lived on.

If there was a king in the East that sexually harassed her,
she would be genuinely angry, no matter the difference in status.

Despite the immortals predicting that
the king would perish if he were to be left alone.

If she found a genius and beautiful immortal in the West,
she would fall in love at first sight and chase after him without shame,
decency, or regard for public appearance.

In the end, like a villainess in a story,
she was rejected in front of a large crowd, laughed at, and made to leave.

If she found a frayed light of ill omen in the North,
she would devote herself to its repair, even if it meant putting herself in danger.

With her hair in disarray, her shoes thrown away,
she did so desperately, gritting her teeth.

No one knows why that Nüwa ended up saving the world.
Someone said that she was probably irritated because her eyes were flickering.

Even if the world were to be destroyed, we could just start over.
Someone else laughed, saying she didn't even understand that.

There are not many heroes with such a mix of praise and censure.
No, if anything, she was a person of mostly 'faults'.

She couldn't help, but to reach out to shining things.
She couldn't help, but to chase after shining things.

Just, like a summer insect diving into a flame.
Many wise men laughed at Nüwa.

But, when I heard that, I thought.
Who on Earth can say that they can 'completely see the future'?

If a person saves someone in front of them,
and as a result, many people become unhappy in the future?

Will I stop saving them?
...There's no way I can know that.

Before I knew it, my way of life was
following in the footsteps of such a world-class problem child.

According to the 'faith' of my homeland, the aurora that trails in that sky,
is a sign that the heavens have been torn. Someone is grieving beneath it.

That is why, I keep on running towards there.
Even if, I don't know what lies ahead in the shining light.

The bell that signals the time rang.
A time when the sun still shines brightly in the Tokyo sky—

name: Mononobe
text:
—That's all for the summer vacation homework.
You're free to proceed on it as you wish, but I recommend you do it systematically.

name: Mononobe
text:
Of course, if you want to take extra supplementary lessons,
you don't have to make it in time for the submission date.

options.text: I'd like to take your supplementary lessons, teacher.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Mononobe
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I see, then I'll watch over you closely.
I won't let you escape until you finish your homework.

name: Mononobe
text:
Well then, have a good summer vacation.
Everyone, take care of your health.

The classroom is as noisy as usual,
with some lamenting the amount of homework,
others looking forward to their future plans.

name: Kengo
text:
Dammit... The amount of homework got increased again!
Isn't this supposed to be the time we can put ourselves into training?

name: Shiro
text:
You already have supplementary lessons for the final exams,
so I'll be involved with your summer vacation homework right from the beginning.

name: Shiro
text:
If you finish it up early,
you can concentrate on your training, right?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shiro
dialogue_after_selection.text:
J-Just what kind of person do you think I am?
I would only get angry when you abandon your homework.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shiro
dialogue_after_selection.text: But [Player], you seem to be busy too, so if there's anything I can do to help, just let me know.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Kengo
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hehe, thanks as always, partner!
I'll spar with you next time as a thank you.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shiro
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Is that supposed to be a thank you...?
Well, if [Player] is okay with it, then I guess...

options.text: I have to balance it with my fire brigade activities.

name: Ryota
text:
[Player] is also a member
of the fire brigade, huh?

name: Toji
text:
I heard from Master Hogen of the Shinjuku Police that you were
called as a member of the disaster prevention team for the theme park.

name: Ryota
text:
It's Hakumen-chan and Gyumao-san's place, right~?
Sure seems like a lot of work, but I'm a little envious too!

name: Kengo
text:
But hey, fires don't even happen that often.
Is there really any point in coming there days on end?

name: Shiro
text:
Stop it, Kengo.
That's what they call a flag.

options.text: In fact, there was already a fire...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Moritaka
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Th-That must have been terrible.
I'm glad you're safe, [Player]-dono...

name: Moritaka
text:
Not just limited to school and guild activities,
you're lending your hand to so many people,
that it makes you look really dazzling~

name: Student
text:
—Hey, [Player]!
Is it true you're working at T.S.L.?

name: Student
text:
I've been hearing about it for a while, and I'm curious.
There's not much information out yet, so what's it like inside—?

name: Ryota
text:
Gourmet! Sweets!!
If you could just give me the littlest bit of a hint~~

name: Moritaka
text:
Well, well, the opening day must be soon, right?
There's no need to rush, the official information will be—

name: Student
text:
Please!
I won't post it on social media or anything!

name: Student
text:
What kind of attractions are there?
Is it okay to swim in the river that was in the pamphlet?

note: fantasizing about NDAs is a very Ryota thing

options.text: I was wondering about it myself~?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Ryota
dialogue_after_selection.text:
That sounds nice!
I wish I could say that I can't say because of a confidentiality agreement someday too~

When told it's a secret, people become curious.
Classmates began to gather around [Player].

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shennong
dialogue_after_selection.text: —Hey, hey, you guys, you shouldn't force them to talk about work, alright?

options.text: Sorry, I'm under a confidentiality agreement.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Ryota
dialogue_after_selection.text:
That sounds nice!
I wish I could say that I can't say because of a confidentiality agreement someday too~

When told it's a secret, people become curious.
Classmates began to gather around [Player].

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shennong
dialogue_after_selection.text: —Hey, hey, you guys, you shouldn't force them to talk about work, alright?

options.text: So I'd need you to keep this a secret—

dialogue_after_selection.text:
Oh, my dear problem child?
What do you want me to keep a secret?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shennong
dialogue_after_selection.text: That goes for you guys too, don't do anything that makes [Player]-kun get carried away?

text:
Just as the barrage of questions was about to begin,
Shennong visited [Player]'s classroom.

name: Shennong
text:
Hey, I'm going to work at T.S.L. now,
but since that would be the case for you too, [Player]-kun,
I was wondering if I could give you a ride.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shennong
dialogue_after_selection.text:
It's just a kind gesture.
Or, do you have something on your mind, my dear problem child?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shennong
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Don't worry, it'll just sting a little.
...Hahaha, just kidding. So, are you coming along?

options.text: Then, I'll take you up on your offer.
You should just be honest and tell me to go together.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shennong
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...You're right! I really wanted you to come, [Player]-kun.
I just remembered there's a vaccination I need to give you.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shennong
dialogue_after_selection.text:
It's alright, it's alright, nothing to be scared of.
...Just kidding. So, are you coming along?

text:
From Shinjuku Academy to Roppongi where T.S.L. is,
they travel in Shennong's car on this day.

For the next few days until the reopening day,
[Player] was to stay overnight and work.

options.text: Why did you suddenly invite me?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shennong
dialogue_after_selection.text: You seem to get involved in dangerous things without thinking, but you do have sharp intuition sometimes, you problem child.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shennong
dialogue_after_selection.text: It's also because today is the last day of school, that I was able to finish my work at the academy in advance.

options.text: This is certainly easier than taking the train.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shennong
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I finished my work at Shinjuku Academy.
Since it's the last day of school, there was less work to do.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shennong
dialogue_after_selection.text: As a teacher at the same academy, for now, I'll just say that you've done a great job.

options.text: You're okay with being with me today.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shennong
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I finished my work at Shinjuku Academy.
Since it's the last day of school, there was less work to do.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shennong
dialogue_after_selection.text: As a teacher at the same academy, for now, I'll just say that you've done a great job.

name: Shennong
text:
Schoolwork, guild activities, and even the fire brigade.
You really stick your neck into anything you don't understand in the slightest.

As he says that, Shennong takes out a petri dish
from his pocket, picks up a blade of grass, and starts eating it.

name: Shennong
text:
This? It's a new species of grass I found this morning.
...Oh, it's bad, it's poisonous, hahaha!

options.text: Don't put things you don't know in your mouth!
You're going to die someday, Shennong-sensei?

name: Shennong
text:
...I can't believe you're the one saying that to me.
They do say you can't see yourself unless someone else points it out.

name: Shennong
text:
But after all, someone has to put it in their mouth first.
In that case, it's better if I do it.

name: Shennong
text:
Even if it's just a repetition of the same pattern,
'the one who did it first' is still special.

name: Shennong
text:
I want to be the first one to do it in this world.
That way... No one else will have to cry from a stomachache, right?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shennong
dialogue_after_selection.text: ...Certainly, being called a worrywart fits better than 'meddlesome'.

options.text: So you do have yourself a cute side.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shennong
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Right?
The Shennong-sensei that you know is much cuter than he looks.

name: Shennong
text:
...But well, to be honest,
I was surprised when I heard you joined the fire brigade.

name: Shennong
text:
When I was in Penglai, I also had a lot of 'connections' with fire.
Both in a good way and a not-so-good way.

name: Shennong
text:
I used fire to help with agriculture and medicine, and before I knew it,
I was being called by the grand name of the 'Flame Emperor'.

options.text: How did you use fire back then?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shennong
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hmm, for example, there's a thing called fire therapy.
In Penglai, you spray a thick cloth with high-proof medicinal wine and—

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shennong
dialogue_after_selection.text:
You cover the patient with it and set it on fire.
If you do it right, you can relieve muscle pain and fatigue.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shennong
dialogue_after_selection.text:
For agriculture, slash-and-burn is easy to understand.
It's a method of burning a part of a forest or grassland to fertilize the land with the ash.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shennong
dialogue_after_selection.text:
However, if you do either of these without thinking, there will be a painful backlash.
I thought I'd need to tell you that too...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shennong
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Yeah, the writing was top-notch.
Well, I guess I did a decent job.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shennong
dialogue_after_selection.text: But, remember, a truly great work isn't recognized until long after the person is gone.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shennong
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Sometimes it's not recognized by those who lived in the same era.
...So don't get discouraged, even if what you did isn't understood.

options.text: I won't stop playing with your fire, Shennong.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shennong
dialogue_after_selection.text:
You really are something...
Don't you have any comebacks that aren't precocious?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shennong
dialogue_after_selection.text: —And besides, my fire isn't the kind of small fire that you can do something about.

As if to take a breath, Shennong opens the car window.
...He frowns at the heat of the wind and closes the window.

name: Shennong
text:
I was also something like a firefighter in my hometown.
One of my student says he's joined the fire brigade.

name: Shennong
text:
I think it's admirable as an extracurricular activity,
and as a teacher, I want to praise you, but—

name: Shennong
text:
...You don't have to go that far.
It's not an easy job, to be honest.

Shennong cuts off his words and stares into the distance,
as if he was reminding himself of something.

options.text: Don't worry, I have reliable seniors.
It's alright, I'll wear fireproof equipment.
Shennong, you will treat me even if I get injured, right?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shennong
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Honestly, some kind of warmonger you say you are...
If you're saying that, you're prepared for a big injection, aren't you?

name: Shennong
text:
Chief Cinderella and Red Hood-kun,
they're certainly reliable seniors.

name: Shennong
text:
...But, as your teacher, no, as me,
I wanted you to live in a safe place.

name: Shennong
text:
But, I won't try to stop you anymore.
If you were to stop with just that,
you wouldn't be in this situation in the first place.

At the red light,
Shennong took a breath and held out his device.

name: Shennong
text:
My private account contact information.
It prioritizes notifications over the App's messaging function.

name: Shennong
text:
When you're entering a dangerous site,
if you contact me, I'll come running.

name: Shennong
text:
I'll be able to help you out a little.
Of course, I can also... treat you.

name: Shennong
text:
So please, don't go to where I can't go...
Or some place I don't know of.

options.text: Okay, I'll let you know when I'm about to collapse!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shennong
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Nnnnngh!
You have a point, but that's not what I meant!!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shennong
dialogue_after_selection.text:
That joke wasn't funny in the slightest.
...Having someone like you around is a lot of stress.

options.text: You can also have my private contact information...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shennong
dialogue_after_selection.text:
You have different ones as well...?
Oh, right, you have guild activities in the App.

text:
After exchanging the contact information again,
Shennong's expression softened in relief.

name: Shennong
text:
I'm an instructor for first aid training here,
but I've done similar things many times before.

name: Shennong
text:
And that brought back a lot of old memories.
About, when I was a military doctor.

name: Shennong
text:
They all get patched up and go back to the battlefield.
I give those guys extra painful treatment!

name: Shennong
text:
...But even so, I'm always the last one left behind.
Even if I wish for them to come back, they don't even look back—

name: Shennong
text:
—So to speak. It's a thing of the past,
but I got a little more worked up than usual there.

options.text: I don't like pain, so it'll be alright.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shennong
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Is that so?
Then, in order to escape from your big brother's injection, you'll listen to what I say, right?

options.text: I know how important having comrades must be.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shennong
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...I suppose.
Is this like preaching to the choir?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shennong
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Haha, this person is saying they'll actually make it back, my stomach's hurting...
No, it's nothing, just talking to myself.

name: Shennong
text:
...Well, anyway, I'm cheering for you.
As a senior— And as a promising new firefighter.

Upon arriving at T.S.L.,
they part ways with Shennong for a while and head to their usual standby area.

Perhaps because the opening day is approaching,
the park was bustling with staff in training.

name: Red Hood
text:
...Ah, you're finally here!
This way, [Player]!!

name: Cinderella
text:
How are you feeling?
Today is the last day of training, so keep your guard up!

options.text: I'm in top shape today too!
Is this what Shennong was talking about?
What should we do for fun today...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Red Hood
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Right!?
There seems to be a lot more attractions to try out, so I'm looking forward to it as well!

name: Red Hood
text:
And for today,
there will be a launch test for the fireworks.

name: Cinderella
text:
It's not that there's any special work for you, [Player],
but there's always a chance of an emergency.
Don't forget you're in the fire brigade, alright?

As they met and exchanged greetings,
a person appeared out of nowhere.

name: Yuma
text:
[Player], good work.
As expected, you were here. Could tell by smell!

name: Yuma
text:
...So, [Player].
Later, if possible, you pull the lead, on my harness—

Yuma suddenly cuts off his words
and lunges behind [Player].

name: Hogen
text:
Woahh!!
An excellent guard dog, magnificent... *gasp*...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hogen
dialogue_after_selection.text: No, I just found my cute disciple, and thought I'd scare them from behind, that is all—

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hogen
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Come to think of it, you are the companion my beloved disciple chose themselves.
It's no wonder you have the power to take me down.

options.text: My guard dog is strong, isn't he?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hogen
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Come to think of it, you are the companion my beloved disciple chose themselves.
It's no wonder you have the power to take me down.

name: Yuma
text:
[Player], disciple? Disciple, student...?
[Player]'s teacher, you are...!?

name: Hogen
text:
Oh, I haven't told you yet?
That's right, I'm the one who taught and raised [Player]—

name: Yuma
text:
I, attacked...
[Player]'s teacher...?

note: no, no, Yuma you are doing a great job

options.text: My love madness is also my master's fault.
I've never once thought of him as my master.

name: Oscar
text:
Well, thank you, Yuma-kun.
Please let me send my regards to you as well.

name: Oscar
text:
For the very fact,
of protecting my swallow in my stead.

name: Hogen & Yuma
text: Huh...?

name: Red Hood
text:
This looks like a really fun situation!?
Let me join in as well!

name: Cinderella
text:
Are you trying to add fuel to the fire?
And, it's about time for the training to begin.

Ah, right.
To start with, I was instructed to hand out copies of the materials to everyone.

name: Ifrit
text:
Whoa, if it isn't you, [Player]!?
To think we'd have such a strange connection
at my part-time job to earn money for the band!

name: Hercules
text:
...[Player]?
Master, to think you were also working here...!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hercules
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I see, the fire brigade...
If my memories serve me right, their role is to protect people from fire disasters.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hercules
dialogue_after_selection.text:
We've been assigned as part-time staff in a different area.
If anything happens, please contact me directly and I'll handle it.

options.text: I came as a member of the fire brigade.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hercules
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I see, the fire brigade...
If my memories serve me right, their role is to protect people from fire disasters.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hercules
dialogue_after_selection.text:
We've been assigned as part-time staff in a different area.
If anything happens, please contact me directly and I'll handle it.

options.text: I wonder what kind of training it is.

text:
Hercules hands [Player] a document
with several sheets of paper stapled together.

name: Hercules
text:
This is the material for the emergency life-saving measures lecture
that Shennong, the first aid squad leader, will be giving. Please take a look.

name: Hercules
text:
Now, I must hand out the materials to the others.
I'll be excusing myself for now.

name: Yuma
text:
Life-saving measures...?
I, not in medical team, alright?

name: Hogen
text:
Exactly, all related personnel are required to attend the lecture.
You never know where or when something might happen.

name: Cinderella
text:
First aid training, huh?
It has been a while since I've had something like this...
I do remember being amazed at the medical technology that this world has to offer.

name: Red Hood
text:
I've only done it once when I first joined.
Maybe I can teach [Player] a little!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Red Hood
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Yes, yes, of course!
If there's something you don't understand...
Let's think about it together.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Cinderella
dialogue_after_selection.text:
You should ask the instructor that.
Or at least, you should ask me.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Oscar
dialogue_after_selection.text: Because I'm the type to prepare for the unexpected, I sincerely hope that this time, it will be just preparation.

options.text: Master, if you do anything wicked, I'll report you.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hogen
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I haven't tried to do anything yet, not yet!!
I wouldn't joke around during a lecture...
Not convincing enough?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hogen
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Don't be in such a hurry, my disciple.
After the practice, we'll have the real thing?

name: Shennong
text:
—Alright, everyone, pay attention.
It's about time to start the lecture.

name: Shennong
text:
The content is a lecture on the basics of first aid,
and training for a water accident.

name: Shennong
text:
For now, we'll change locations.
Everyone, please follow me.

The gathered people are assembled in
a conference room in the staff-only area.

Then, they were explained how to deal with heatstroke patients and
the procedures in case of a sudden illness.

name: Shennong
text:
—Next, we'll learn about cardiopulmonary
resuscitation for beastman species.

name: Shennong
text:
It's basically the same as the treatment for humans that I just explained,
but there are a few major differences. Do you know what they are?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yuma
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Yes, put on, life-saving device, change, to special mode.
Or, shave fur.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shennong
dialogue_after_selection.text:
That's right.
If you forget to do this, the device may not function properly.

options.text: Because the shape of their mouth is different—?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yuma
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Yes, artificial respiration, also different.
Close mouth, with hand, and blow air, through nose.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shennong
dialogue_after_selection.text:
That's right.
It's a small difference, but it affects the survival rate.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Oscar
dialogue_after_selection.text: You're so straightforward, you're almost too bright for me...!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shennong
dialogue_after_selection.text:
It's much better than just going along with others without understanding.
As you can see, beastman species have fur, and the shape of their mouths differs from person to person.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shennong
dialogue_after_selection.text: So, switch the life-saving device to the dedicated mode, and perform artificial respiration not through the mouth, but through the nose.

name: Shennong
text:
How quickly you administer treatment changes the outcome.
From here on, we'll learn the basics through hands-on practice—

After that, they practiced the knowledge they learned
in the classroom using a dummy.

Some moved clumsily,
while others moved with some degree of familiarity.

name: Cinderella
text:
Hey, Reddy, the electric pads are on the wrong side.
What are you doing!?

name: Red Hood
text:
No way!! Oh, right, were the insides of humans here
swapped left and right with the fairy world?

name: Hogen
text:
Well then, I'll show you my CPR technique.
Witness the handiwork of a seasoned veteran.

name: Cinderella
text:
I hate to say it, but his movement is surprisingly smooth.
Enough to pass our rescue exam.

name: Hogen
text:
...Hmph, Cinderella.
It's unsettling to be praised by you.

name: Shennong
text:
If it's an external wound like a cut, first wash it with the cleanest water possible,
and then press down hard with a cloth that's as clean as possible.

name: Shennong
text:
The subsequent treatment depends on the condition.
I'll give some common examples and explain on how to deal with them—

No matter how proficient he is in medicine,
Shennong only has one body.

On a battlefield where numerous casualties occur in an instant,
it was difficult for Shennong to treat all of them.

So, to save as many lives as possible,
he drilled the basics of first aid into the soldiers.

name: Shennong
text:
It's no exaggeration to say that the initial treatment changes the survival rate.
Everyone, please remember this well.

name: Soldier
text:
I've never learned how to treat wounds before.
With this, I think I can keep fighting longer than before.

name: Soldier
text:
Yeah! If I can treat myself,
I won't have to go to the field hospital.
I'm indebted to you, Shennong-sama.

What's broken once will never be fixed.
Unless there's some kind of magic—
Is that what you think?

name: Yuma
text:
Cardiac massage, tiring...
[Player], together, drink, later...!

name: Oscar
text:
In that case, how about the wagon that sells
whole coconuts as drinks?

name: Staff
text:
Hey, isn't our team
a little behind!?

name: Staff
text:
We still have time,
so let's take our time.

name: Shennong
text:
...It's so peaceful.
Not a shred of a sense of crisis here.

name: Shennong
text:
Well, I guess I'm not in the position to talk.
This lecture is exactly what I originally wanted—

name: Hercules
text:
―Is it my turn now?
Place the heels of the hand on the chest of the doll...
Woah!!

name: Seth
text:
W-W-W-Whoa!!!
The dummy...!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Seth
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Yo, it's you, [Player]!
I never thought I'd see you here?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Seth
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I was indebted to this place even before the renewal.
I wanted to help out, so I went to President Gyumao directly and—

dialogue_after_selection.name: Seth
dialogue_after_selection.text:
—But, is this really the time for that!?
What kind of strength do you have to make that happen...

name: Hercules
text:
I'm sorry...!
Is everyone alright!?

name: Hercules
text:
I was told to press hard enough to make the chest sink,
and I thought I did as I was told, but...

name: Cinderella
text:
Ahahaha!
Aren't things starting to get crazy around here?

name: Hogen
text:
What great strength.
If I had interfered earlier...
I don't even want to imagine.

name: Hogen
text:
Ahem.
Then, I'll lend you the doll our group was using.
Since everyone over here finished smoothly.

name: Oscar
text:
This lecture is a preparation to avoid the fun summer
in Tokyo being overwritten with sad memories.

name: Oscar
text:
It's an important role behind the scenes,
but it's a role I can't possibly fulfill on my own.
Can I count on you?

name: Seth
text:
I was so surprised that I ended up screaming out loud too.
This is just practice, so don't worry too much about it.

name: Hercules
text:
...Ah! To be able to meet your expectations,
I will do my best to train myself in this practice field!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shennong
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...You figured it out, didn't you?
Well, ask me why during the fireworks.

options.text: I'll help you clean up the wreckage.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yuma
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I'll help, as well.
With everyone, it'll be fast!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hercules
dialogue_after_selection.text:
My mistake has caused everyone trouble...
I will definitely repay this favor!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Seth
dialogue_after_selection.text:
You're exaggerating, this is simply about helping each other.
Hey, did you just pick up my shed fur...?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yuma
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Cleaning shed fur, staff work.
Not, collecting. Not, what I'm doing, no.

options.text: What should I do after this?

name: Shennong
text:
...Now, the groups that have finished their practical training will take a break.
Your next practical training will be at the pool. Everyone, don't get too excited, alright?

Some people's eyes sparkled at the mention of the pool,
while others breathed a sigh of relief at finally being able to go outside.

Faced with this scene, Shennong
let out a big sigh and narrowed his eyes.

name: Shennong
text:
...Oops, it's strangely bright.
Everything in front of me looks strangely sparkly.

Shennong vigorously rubbed his eyes
with his arm and looked at the scene in front of him again.

name: Shennong
text:
—I've been thinking about the old days a lot lately.
I didn't think too deeply when I took the job, though.

name: Shennong
text:
Maybe, I've forgotten what I originally intended to do, and haven't been myself lately.
Should I, like the Flame Emperor, dive head first without thinking about the consequences?

It was as if he had returned to the time,
when he first started running. Shennong smiled and said.

name: Shennong
text:
...About the next lecture,
if you finish early, you can go play in the pool.

name: Shennong
text:
I just felt like doing it on a whim.
The staff have the right to enjoy summer too, don't they?

It would have been better if I could have sent
them back to paradise instead of the battlefield.
Inside Shennong, his past self— muttered so.

Chapter 3:
The Military Doctor and The Seven-Colored Fireworks

This is a passage from a famous fairy tale
that everyone in that world knows.

Without being understood by anyone,
without being cared for by anyone,
there was a woman who continued to be covered in ashes.

There was no one by her side who understood her.
How can one describe the feelings towards such a woman?

Eh, you ask me what I thought of that person?
Is that what you're asking?

...Did I feel close to her?
To think so, the places and times we lived in were too far apart.

...Did I respect her?
To think so, her legend was far too outlandish.

That's right— If I were to express my feelings
towards that person in just one word.
—I'm sure, it would be 'anger'.

—The staff of T.S.L. continue their first aid training.
This time, they were gathered at a pool that imitates nature.

name: Shennong
text:
It's a bit strange for me to say
this with the fire brigade here, but—

name: Shennong
text:
Even if you see someone drowning,
only those with specialized training should go in to help.

name: Shennong
text:
...To say the least, that should be the
general common sense, and it's not wrong in any way.

options.text: So if we undergo specialized training now, there won't be any problem.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hogen
dialogue_after_selection.text:
That's a great point you've got!
Then I shall bestow upon you, the secret art of water training.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Oscar
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Oops, training actors would be my job.
I've also established a new method this time.
Please leave it to me.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hogen
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hmm, I was hoping to join you in my swimsuit...
Ahem, never mind.
Shall we hear about that method then?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yuma
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Me too, me too!
Can swim, good at, doggy paddling.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yuma
dialogue_after_selection.text:
But, never carried, someone else, while swimming.
Never saved, drowning person, either.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Red Hood
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Just swimming and rescuing are two different things.
You shouldn't just jump in without thinking!

name: Shennong
text:
Lifeguards will be stationed around the swimming area.
However, it will be impossible to cover the entire park with the number of people we have.

name: Shennong
text:
So, after consulting with the owners,
we've implemented this.

Shennong says and operates his device.
Then, he glances at the pool.

name: Assistant Shark
text:
Beep. Hello, I am 'Assistant Shark Ver. T.S.L.'.
I will assist in making your vacation even better.

name: Assistant Shark
text:
Beep beep. Staff license confirmed.
Please state your business.

note:
normally I wouldn't assign sprites just for mobs,
but it seems like this thing will be important later

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shennong
dialogue_after_selection.text:
What, you know about it as well?
Then you must have been acquainted with Kamata Technical Academy.

options.text: I see, you're leaving the rescue to them too.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Red Hood
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Aaahhhhhh!!!
Having a real shark swimming around is a huge attempt at realism!!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Cinderella
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Calm down, Reddy.
Does this look like a real shark to you?
It just spoke in front of you.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Red Hood
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Oh, right.
And it's floating in mid-air.
Amazing.

name: Shennong
text:
This is a biological robot provided by the Crafters.
It was originally for life support,
but it's been adjusted for rescue support... Apparently.

Shennong glances at Oscar,
and Oscar nods and walks up next to Shennong.

name: Oscar
text:
Precisely! We have introduced it to cover the risk
of accidents in this large pool.

name: Oscar
text:
If someone happens to drown in the pool,
these guys will detect them and go on to rescue.

name: Oscar
text:
And of course,
they'll also contact the first aid team.

options.text: Do I need to be trained myself...?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shennong
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Yeah.
This thing's levitation power can't carry them on land, and there's a limit to how many can operate at once.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shennong
dialogue_after_selection.text: So, after this thing pulls them out of the pool, the staff who happened to be there will have to take over.

options.text: Is there anything it can't do?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shennong
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Yeah.
This thing's levitation power can't carry them on land, and there's a limit to how many can operate at once.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shennong
dialogue_after_selection.text: So, after this thing pulls them out of the pool, the staff who happened to be there will have to take over.

options.text: So it's not rescue, but first aid training, right?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yuma
dialogue_after_selection.text: I see, save drowning person, after that, we, take over...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shennong
dialogue_after_selection.text:
That's right.
I'll have you train so you can handle it once you're there.

name: Shennong
text:
First, I'll teach you how to call
and give instructions to the Assistant Shark.

name: Shennong
text:
After that, in addition to the CPR we did earlier,
we'll practice water-specific precautions and procedures. Do your best.

And so, the second half of the training began.
They split into small groups again and started the practical training.

In the pool that imitates a natural river,
a trained person playing the role of a person in need of rescue is placed—

name: Yuma
text:
Um, this button.
Assistant Shark, emergency dispatch—

name: Hogen
text:
Alright, I've got the towels and blankets.
Now we just have to wait for that shark.

name: Assistant Shark
text:
Thank you for your call.
This is T.S.L. Assistant Shark.
Please present your staff license—

name: Seth
text:
I-I messed up!
I just called it normally!!

name: Hercules
text:
Seth-dono, there's no need to worry.
If you give it proper instructions, it should get to rescuing—

name: Red Hood
text:
Ah, look, look, Sandra,
the shark is carrying them away!

name: Cinderella
text:
Ah, that's quite convenient.
To be honest, it would be faster if I did it myself, but—

name: Red Hood
text:
Stop, Sandra!!
Don't jump in its way!

name: Cinderella
text:
I know. They're supposed to learn how to do it themselves,
without relying on us, right? I won't be a spoilsport.

name: Cinderella
text:
The people who surrounded me until now
relied on my power completely.

name: Cinderella
text:
The people here are solving problems with civilization,
even if they can't do it themselves. It's a strange thing.

options.text: The tools of civilization are great.
Well, we're relying on them, though.
I don't need to rely on the shark, though.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Cinderella
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Oh, so you think so too?
Then, between you and me, let's have a competition to see who can rescue someone the fastest.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Red Hood
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hey, you're always getting fired up like that!
...Look, Shennong-sensei is holding a huge syringe!!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Cinderella
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I know.
Let's leave it to our excellent 'little shark'.

name: Red Hood
text:
A lot of rescue robots are being developed these days.
The fact that they can lift heavy rubble, and get into tight spaces is amazing.

name: Red Hood
text:
We firefighters will be out of a job someday...
I hope so, but I guess it's still a long way off.

name: Cinderella
text:
It's not like it's magic, so it's one step at a time.
...But, I guess the day we have to rely on it isn't that far off.

As she says that, Cinderella closes her eyes.
She has always been surrounded by people, living her life covered in ashes.

However, the science, or rather, the civilization
she encountered in this Tokyo seemed a little different.

Using each other's strengths, or using advanced civilization,
they accomplish things that cannot be done alone.

Reliable, and somehow lonely.
...She felt to herself, that time was running out.

name: Hogen
text:
What's wrong, Cinderella-dono?
Your attitude is quite different from the terrorist training the other day.

name: Red Hood
text:
Now that you mention it,
Sandra, you seem a little quiet today. Are you not feeling well?

name: Cinderella
text:
...There's no way I'm not feeling well.
Even I know when to behave myself.

name: Cinderella
text:
Besides, it's all a piece of cake for me.
So I'll just be quiet unless I'm needed.

name: Hogen
text:
I see, it's best to leave it to the young ones and watch over them, that makes sense.
If you would stop your feet for that, I wouldn't have any trouble.

name: Cinderella
text:
Hmph, Hogen, don't misunderstand.
Even I— take a break between dances sometimes.

Thanks to the competence of the Assistant Shark,
the drills are progressing smoothly for all groups.

name: Shennong
text:
—Alright, all the groups are finished.
That's all for today's training.

name: Shennong
text:
However, don't forget that this is just 'first aid'.
If somebody were to suddenly fall ill, or accident occurs,
first contact the first aid team and then—

options.text: Leave it to me in case of an emergency.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shennong
dialogue_after_selection.text: As I said at the beginning, rescue activities are basically left to the professionals, and as a stopgap measure, the content of this lecture—
While Shennong was giving his final talk, a restless atmosphere began to spread from the staff.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shennong
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Honestly, all of you look so fidgety.
Well, I'm the one who said you could play when you were done, so—

options.text: Teach, I want to get in the pool soon.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shennong
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hey, this isn't a school swimming class...
I did say you could play when you were done, but...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hogen
dialogue_after_selection.text:
My tomboyish beloved disciple is still as good as ever.
I myself am looking forward to it in my heart...
Hahaha.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Red Hood
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Everyone, stop interrupting Shennong-sensei!
The time we get to play is running out...
It's making me anxious.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yuma
dialogue_after_selection.text:
T-That's right.
Time to swim, with [Player], running out.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shennong
dialogue_after_selection.text: As I said at the beginning, rescue activities are basically left to the professionals, and as a stopgap measure, the content of this lecture—
While Shennong was giving his final talk, a restless atmosphere began to spread from the staff.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shennong
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Honestly, all of you look so fidgety.
Well, I'm the one who said you could play when you were done, so—

name: Shennong
text:
—Well then, I'll summarize this part
in a text and send it to you later. Good work.

name: Shennong
text:
...What are you spacing out for?
I let you finish, so why don't you go play?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shennong
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hahaha, you're so fickle.
Well, better enjoy the pool while there are no other guests.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hogen
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Alright! I'll be on my way then.
Well, it's all the security work that has been keeping me busy until now.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hogen
dialogue_after_selection.text:
But today, it's just this training and the fireworks test launch.
According to the schedule, we can relax under the guise of training.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hogen
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I'm grateful, Shennong, our dear medical officer.
Now, I'll go change right away.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hogen
dialogue_after_selection.text: I thought something like this might happen, so I came prepared to show off my 'formal wear' at any time.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shennong
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...And he left like a storm.
That person, I can tell that he's tired in multiple ways as well.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Cinderella
dialogue_after_selection.text:
You look like you've turned to ash.
You should take a good rest.
I should be enough for standby.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yuma
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Then, I, go get, drink.
[Player], rest there, under umbrella.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yuma
dialogue_after_selection.text: If... If you feel better, want to play, in the water, together.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Red Hood
dialogue_after_selection.text: [Player], Yuma-kun, let's race to see who can jump in the fastest!!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yuma
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Won't lose. Will do best.
If I, get first place, praise me!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Red Hood
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Alright!!
Then everyone, on your mark, get set—

dialogue_after_selection.name: Red Hood
dialogue_after_selection.text:
—J-Just kidding, it's just a joke!
I'm a firefighter, I would never do something like that!!

name: Shennong
text:
Just because it's empty,
don't go too crazy, alright...?

name: Shennong
text:
And for those of you who are assigned for the fireworks test launch,
don't be late for the meeting time.

name: Red Hood
text:
Huh, Oscar-san isn't here?
We were together just a moment ago.

name: Cinderella
text:
That's right, I don't see him anywhere.
He's the de facto site manager, so he's probably busy, right?

name: Cinderella
text:
If you're curious, I can go look for him.
I'm on standby, so I'll do it on the way.

name: Red Hood
text:
Eh, you're not going to play, Sandra?
There's still time until the fireworks.

name: Cinderella
text:
You go play with the others!
Since I was asked to do this as a member of the fire brigade,
I can't help myself but to be more concerned about that.

name: Red Hood
text:
If you say so, Sandra...
Well then, [Player], shall we go too?

Many of the staff who had no other work than training
spent their break at the pool or the facilities around the park.

name: Hogen
text:
Yahoo!!
To be able to legally slack off, isn't it the best?

name: Yuma
text:
[Player], [Player], let's swim, together.
During fireworks, probably be, at work...
Won't be together, so, while we can.

name: Red Hood
text:
Even though it's not open yet,
they're selling swimsuits, how business-savvy~!!

name: Red Hood
text:
Of course I'm going to buy one!!
Oh boy, I'm getting excited!

note: everyday we are reminded of MC's swimsuit variants being robbed by LW

options.text: Red Hood, that swimsuit looks good on you.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Red Hood
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ehehe...
I'm embarrassed when you say it so directly.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Red Hood
dialogue_after_selection.text:
You look good too, [Player]!
Oh... Should we find a good spot and take a picture later!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hogen
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Oops, I let my guard down!
I've been caught by my beloved disciple.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hogen
dialogue_after_selection.text: My diamond body, gifted from the heavens, how does it feel to hug, my beloved disciple?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yuma
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Whoa, you, very bold, like Alp...
Revenge, get you back, [Player]!

name: Seth
text:
Oh, the ball is coming this way...!
Look out!!

Yuma was the first to react to that voice.
He impressively catches the flying beach ball in mid-air.

name: Red Hood
text:
Whoa, nice catch!
How did you react so quickly, even though it was so sudden!?

name: Hogen
text:
Hmm, it seems I didn't even need to move.
To react to a surprise attack, and leap from the water...
I'm getting more and more interested.

name: Yuma
text:
...Catching balls, with Hastur sometimes,
so, a little good.

name: Seth
text:
Sorry, sorry!
The ball went flying off in a weird direction.

name: Hercules
text:
I put too much force into it again.
Seth-dono barely managed to hit it back,
but as a result it went out of control—

name: Seth
text:
I-I'm telling you,
don't get so down!

name: Hogen
text:
Hahaha, if you're not used to playing with a ball,
it's normal for it to fly off in the wrong direction.

name: Hogen
text:
Even at the police academy, during the ball game tournament,
several windows get broken... *sigh*.

name: Shennong
text:
—Oh, there you are.
You seem to be having fun.

name: Shennong
text:
Beach volleyball?
That's nice, can your teacher join in as well?

options.text: Is it okay for you to go in the pool?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shennong
dialogue_after_selection.text: 'The swimming area is vast, so your poison will be diluted, and high-performance filtration devices are placed in various locations—'

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shennong
dialogue_after_selection.text:
'In short, even if you soak in the pool for an entire 24 hours, it's no problem.
Enjoy yourself to the fullest!!'

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shennong
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...So it seems.
Thanks to that, I can keep an eye on my dear problem child, even in the pool.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hercules
dialogue_after_selection.text: I don't know the details, but we can enjoy ourselves together.

name: Hogen
text:
In that case,
shall I join in as well?

name: Seth
text:
Alright, but I'm not going easy on you all.
I'll make sure to beat you all to pulp, so come at me all at once!!

name: Hercules
text:
With the appropriate amount of force,
but without holding back, I will face you fair and square.

name: Red Hood
text:
Phew, my body's heating up!
I'll give it my all as well!

name: Yuma
text:
Then, I, go borrow, volleyball set.
Just now, found a place, for free rentals.

After deciding on teams, which also served as introductions,
just as they were getting ready to start the game.

options.text: I have to go beat up the Crafters later.

name: Cinderella
text:
...Hey, hey, hey!
That doesn't look like a rescue machine at all!?

name: Cinderella
text:
I was just planning on watching,
but I guess I'll have to step in—

Oh, there's no need for that.
But if you're going to participate, then you're more than welcome.

name: Cinderella
text:
—I see, so that's what you were up to when I couldn't find you.
In other words, this is your doing again.

name: Oscar
text:
This time, it's improvisation!
It's unexpected, but I thought it was a good time to try it out.

Oscar waves his cane like a conductor's baton.
Then, the sharks lined up in the pool in a coordinated manner.

name: Oscar
text:
Well, well!! Did I surprise you?
I thought this would be a good opportunity, with all the staff gathered at the pool.

name: Oscar
text:
From now on, I'll be holding a trial
of the actual event. It is called—

name: Oscar
text: <strong>Tropical Shark Panic!!

name: Oscar
text:
The rules are simple.
When you shoot with the special radio wave gun,
you get points depending on the part you hit.

name: Oscar
text:
And within the time limit,
the one who collects the most points will receive a prize! That is all.

options.text: You just dropped that on us!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Red Hood
dialogue_after_selection.text:
W-What a surprise.
So it was an activity.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yuma
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Surprised...
But, this thing, don't usually do...
Interested, a bit.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yuma
dialogue_after_selection.text:
[Player], if you do it, I, support you.
Want to.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Cinderella
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I'll admit, you've got guts.
Even I was starting to get impatient.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Oscar
dialogue_after_selection.text:
As a planner, I couldn't be happier.
This is a rather extraordinary space, but—

dialogue_after_selection.name: Oscar
dialogue_after_selection.text: I thought that if I directed the familiar 'ferocious shark in the sea' within it, the classic would have a different flavor.

note: [This choice will only be available if you picked Option 1]

options.text: I can't refuse if you say that...!
Then I'll protect you myself, Yuma.

name: Oscar
text:
The sharks will also counterattack with water currents, so be careful.
Getting hit is a point loss.

name: Oscar
text:
And since damage to the boss's weak point
will get you a high score, better do your best.

name: Shennong
text:
How absurd...
No, wait, did you just say 'boss'—?

name: Cinderella
text:
This is quite ominous.
But it's getting a little interesting.

name: Red Hood
text:
Then, then, Sandra, would you like to join?
I'll finally get to have a contest with you!?

name: Cinderella
text:
If you really want me to join, I don't mind,
but I don't need any strange considerations, alright?

name: Red Hood
text:
Oh no, I wasn't trying to force you.
Of course, I respect your feelings, Sandra.

name: Cinderella
text: Hmm, you're right...

name: Shennong
text:
Good grief, a fight just after first aid training.
It brings back old memories, really.

name: Shennong
text:
—So,
where's this radio wave gun?

name: Hogen
text:
Oh, our dear medical officer, you are interested as well.
I thought you're a bit strict yourself?

name: Shennong
text:
No, I just thought I'd enjoy
the fun time while I still can.

name: Shennong
text:
Let's see just how much fun the place I'm sending them back to
after I've treated them as a first aid team is.

name: Hogen
text:
In that case, shall I show everyone
my graceful movements?

name: Assistant Shark
text:
Beep, this is the dedicated radio wave gun.
Please take one of your choice, one per person!

The Assistant Shark, which was for rescue until a moment ago,
carries various radio wave guns of all sizes and distributes them
to those who have expressed their interest in participating.

name: Oscar
text:
Has everyone got a gun?
Well then, everyone, are you ready?

options.text: I won't give up first place.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hogen
dialogue_after_selection.text:
That's the spirit.
Show me the results of your hard work.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hogen
dialogue_after_selection.text: If you can defeat me, I'll give you some special reward.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hogen
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Don't worry.
I won't go easy on you.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yuma
dialogue_after_selection.text:
[Player], your order, will do as told.
So, ask anything, don't hold back.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shennong
dialogue_after_selection.text:
You're all fired up too, huh?
Even if it's just for fun, I guess it's my bad habit to get all reminiscent.

name: Oscar
text:
Are you ready?
Three, two, one... Game start!!
Battle Start

—Hey, why, didn't you say
anything back to anyone?

When I started living a similar life,
I started to understand you less and less.

You couldn't have done something as dangerous as
mending the heavens just for show or on a whim, right?

Tell the world that there's no magic that can
control everything with a single swing of a stick.

Today, again, many wounded soldiers passed away.
Life slips through my fingers, one after another.

Don't thank me until you're on your deathbed.
To me, who couldn't save you, covered in the ashes of the battlefield.

Thinking about you— makes me irritated.
And so, there was a time when all I thought about was you.

You should have been recognized more.
So why... were you made a fool of like that?

Who was it that saved you?
Did even your own siblings understand you?

And yet, the reason I could keep running was because you were there,
and because you were running ahead of me.

—Because there was at least one person
in this world who knew the same feeling.

Sometimes I get angry, and I complain.
Sometimes I even tease them.

I'm not your fan.
Of course, I'm not a magician either, so—

We lived in different eras and different places,
but I'm sure you were my ■■.

name: Shark
text:
Guoooo!
Uoooooo...!!!

name: Shennong
text:
Guh... This thing's attacks are certainly cute,
but its mobility is no joke!

name: Hogen
text:
This thing, it's reacting to my Shrinking Earth after it's happened...!
What an interesting mechanism!

name: Oscar
text:
It's equipped with an automatic difficulty adjustment function.
I'm trying to make it so that as many people as possible have a moderately difficult time!

name: Yuma
text:
[Player]! I, create opening...
Ugh, sharks around, getting in the way...!

name: Hercules
text:
What a satisfying experience... But, I seem to be strangely getting excited.
Is it because there's no risk to livelihood, or possibility of injury?
Is this truly a game!?

name: Seth
text:
There's not much time left...!
Argh, I want to beat that big thing more than I want points!!

Those who regret being hit by the water bullets,
those who are happy to hit the weak spot,
those who are simply enjoying themselves.

Cinderella quietly looked down
at such a chaotic pool.

name: Cinderella
text:
They're trying to drag me into the chaos, what a lively bunch.
I wonder what would happen if I were there?

What is required of this child of this land is to prevent disasters,
especially fires, or to protect people from them.

—Cinderella was aware of this, but
what did those children want from her in this place, at this time?

—No, in this peaceful place,
those children wanted nothing from her.

name: Cinderella
text:
...This entertainment seems to be nearing its end.
I guess it's about time to prepare for the fireworks impact assessment.

The 'boss' was judged to be defeated,
and the remaining time limit also reached zero.

Leaving behind those who were praising each other or competing for points,
Cinderella turned her back on the pool to fulfill her duty alone.

After the training and activity trial ended,
[Player] was resting alone at the standby area.

The staff members were managing the flow of traffic in preparation for the real thing,
and the two members of the fire brigade were away for investigation.

options.text: I wonder if I should order something at the shop.
Oh, I've lost my shoes somewhere.

name: Shennong
text:
—Hey, are you alone?
Everyone around's been so busy.

Shennong says, and brings
[Player]'s shoes that had fallen off.

options.text: Put them on for me, my prince.
(Hold out your feet without a word)

name: Shennong
text:
Hey, don't be lazy.
You can put them on yourself.

name: Shennong
text:
Since you're going to run off again once you put them on,
maybe I should just take them for a while... Right?

name: Shennong
text:
But it's not like I'm saying that you're free or something?
It's easy to forget because it's so spacious, but this is the basement.

name: Shennong
text:
They're going to set off actual fireworks, rather than videos.
It's reassuring to have someone who can act in an emergency.

Shennong, holding two drinks, appears
and sits down next to [Player] while offering one of them.

options.text: Didn't you say you were making training materials?

name: Shennong
text:
I've finished my first aid team work.
Right now... I'm free, I guess.

name: Shennong
text:
But the shark subjugation earlier took more out of me than I thought.
If I'm alone, I might fall asleep, so I came here.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shennong
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Maybe, there's still some time until the fireworks,
so I can give you a thorough lecture until then?

options.text: I was just thinking I wanted to see you.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shennong
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Was it good timing? Then I'm glad.
I was also thinking that if I'm going to watch fireworks, I'd like to watch them with someone.

options.text: Just be honest and say you came to propose.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shennong
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Unfortunately, unlike someone else, I'm the type to go through the proper steps.
I'll just say it's not now.

name: Shennong
text:
If I were to say it without hiding anything...
Don't do anything dangerous.

name: Shennong
text:
You may have heard it so many times it's coming out of your ears,
but those who charge in without regard for themselves will eventually fall alone.

name: Shennong
text:
That person who kept mending the tear in the heavens all by herself.
The soldiers who died without a second thought, no matter how much I lectured them.

name: Shennong
text:
—And me, who got tired from running around recklessly,
chasing after that person and those guys.

name: Shennong
text:
...I don't have the right to restrict your actions.
Even if I lecture you, you'll just run off anyway, right?

name: Shennong
text:
Then I'll go to the same place with you.
...It's still more reassuring that way.

options.text: Is that why you gave me your contact information?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shennong
dialogue_after_selection.text:
That's right.
...Don't take it too seriously, it's my own selfish desire.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shennong
dialogue_after_selection.text:
You'll follow me too?
...I see, then maybe we can walk side by side.

options.text: Follow me, if you can catch up.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shennong
dialogue_after_selection.text: You've got some nerve, I'll stop you by force if I have to.

name: Shennong
text:
Sorry for the gloomy talk.
As an apology, I'll give you something good.

As he says that, Shennong takes out
a flat bag with a rather gaudy color.

name: Shennong
text:
It seems that handheld fireworks are okay in some pool areas.
Also, you can see the fireworks display well from a corner of that area.

options.text: It's better than being alone here.
Could it be, you're a novice?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shennong
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Shut up, you're always so cheeky.
...You've been a selfish brat ever since we met, really.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shennong
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Here, I'm inviting you on the date you've always wanted.
If we don't go now, the fireworks will start before we get there.

name: Shennong
text:
...Oh, that's right, [Player].
There was one thing I wanted to ask you now.

name: Shennong
text:
'I want this person and only this person to understand me.'
What would you call someone like that?

name: Shennong
text:
...I see, hehe, hahaha.
No, it's nothing, it's nothing—

Led by Shennong,
they head to the poolside where they can do fireworks.

After arriving, they light the first handheld firework.
A little later, fireworks also went off in the sky of T.S.L.

name: Shennong
text:
I understand what that scriptwriter was saying.
The vibration of the fireworks display, the light,
the heat of the handheld fireworks, the smell of gunpowder—

name: Shennong
text:
Above all, this atmosphere.
You really can't experience it unless it's real... Perhaps.

The handheld firework goes out,
and Shennong stares intently at the fireworks display.

name: Shennong
text:
—In Penglai, the aurora was a sign
of a tear in the heavens, a sign of ill omen.

name: Shennong
text:
I wonder what kind of sign this is, watching it with you.
Hey [Player], what do you think?

In the vibration that resonates to the core of their two bodies,
they felt like they could see an aurora shining in the sky of T.S.L.
